mapper.insert: insert into deal (ITEM_ID, deal_type, USER_ID, PRICE, SIZE, PERIOD, UTILIZATION_POLICY, SALES_CONDITION, STATUS, other_id, CREATED_AT) VALUES (#{item.id}, #{dealType}, #{userId}, #{price}, #{size}, #{period}, #{utilizationPolicy}, #{salesCondition}, #{status}, #{otherId}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: select price from deal where deal_type = 'PURCHASE' and item_id = #{param1} and size = #{param2} and status = 'BIDDING' order by price DESC limit 1
select price from deal where deal_type = 'SALE' and item_id = #{param1} and size = #{param2} and status = 'BIDDING' order by price ASC limit 1

select deal.id as dealId, item.id as itemId, item.item_name as itemName, deal.price as price, deal.period as period, img.id as itemImgId, img.img_url as imgUrl from DEAL deal join Item item on item.id = deal.item_id join ITEM_IMG img on deal.item_id = img.item_id where deal.deal_type = 'PURCHASE' and deal.user_id = #{param1} and deal.status = #{param2} and img.is_representative_img = true order by deal.id DESC

select deal.id as dealId, item.id as itemId, item.item_name as itemName, deal.price as price, deal.period as period, img.id as itemImgId, img.img_url as imgUrl from DEAL deal join Item item on item.id = deal.item_id join ITEM_IMG img on deal.item_id = img.item_id where deal.deal_type = 'SALE' and deal.user_id = #{param1} and deal.status = #{param2} and img.is_representative_img = true order by deal.id DESC
mapper.update: update deal set item_id = #{item.id}, deal_type = #{dealType}, user_id = #{userId}, price = #{price}, size = #{size}, period = #{period}, utilization_policy = #{utilizationPolicy}, sales_condition = #{salesCondition}, other_id = #{otherId}, status = #{status}, created_at = #{createdAt} where id = #{id}
